maqras.text: 36|28|Zai ta zhihou, wo meiyou jiang tianshi qu chengzhi ta de zongzu, wo ye bu changchang jiang tianshi.
36|29|Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu miewangle.
36|30|Ai zai zhong pu! Zhiyao you shizhe lai jiaohua tamen, tamen bian jiayi yunong.
36|31|Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie bei huimie de shidai yong bu zhuan hui chenshi.
36|32|Tamen jiang tongtong bei jujin zai wo nali.
36|33|Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Yi si de dadi, wo shi ta fuhuo, wo shi ta shengzhang liangshi, yi zuo tamen de shipin.
36|34|Wo zai da dishang chuangzao xuduo ye zao yuan, putao yuan, wo shi xuduo yuanquan, cong dixia yong chu,
36|35|yibian tamen shi qi guoshi. Zhexie guoshi bushi tamen de shou zao chulai de, nandao tamen bu ganxie me?
36|36|Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta chuangzao yiqie pei'ou, dimian suo chansheng de, tamen ziji, yiji tamen suo bu zhidao de,(dou you pei'ou).
36|37|Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Wo shi baizhou tuoli heiye, tamen bian huran zai hei'an zhong.
36|38|Taiyang ji xing, zhi yiding suo, na shi wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu suo yuding de.
36|39|Yueliang, wo wei ta yuding gong su, zhidao ta zai bian cheng xiang ganku de ye zao zhi yiyang.
36|40|Taiyang bude zhuiji yueliang, heiye ye bude chaoyue baizhou, ge zai yige guidao shang fuyouzhe.
36|41|Tamen youyi zhong jixiang: Wo shi tamen de zisun, chengzuo manzai de chuanbo.
36|42|Wo wei tamen er chuangzao chuanbo nayang ke gong qi cheng de dongxi.
36|43|Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiu ba tamen yan si, er tamen meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe, tamen jiang bu huo zhengjiu;
36|44|chufei shi yinwei wo de enhui, yinwei wo yao shi tamen xiangle dao mou shi.
36|45|Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang jingwei zai nimen zhiqian de, he zai nimen zhihou de, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin.”
36|46|Mei feng tamen de zhu de yi zhong jixiang lailin tamen, tamen bian beiqi ta.

36|47|Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang fen she an la suo ciyu nimen de.” Name, bu xindao zhe jiang dui xindao zhe shuo:“An la yu gongyang shei jiu gongyang shei, women hebi gongyang ta ne? Nimen zhishi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
36|48|Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
36|49|Tamen zhi dengdai yisheng nahan, zai tamen fenzheng de shihou, xiji tamen;
36|50|tamen jianglai bu neng li yizhu, ye buneng hui jia qu.
36|51|Haojiao yi xiang, tamen jiu cong fenmu chulai, ben xiang tamen de zhu.
36|52|Tamen jiang shuo:“Shang zai women! Shei jiang women cong women de wo chu huanxing? Zhe shi zhiren zhu suo yingxu women de, shizhemen yi shuo shihuale.”
36|53|Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu tongtong bei jujin zai wo zheli.
36|54|Zai na ri, renhe ren bu shou sihao wang qu; nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou.
36|55|Leyuan de jumin zai na ri que shi congshi yu yukuai de.
36|56|Tamen he ziji de pei'ou, zai shu yin xia, kao zai chuangshang.
36|57|Tamen zai leyuan zhong, jiang you shuiguo, bing you tamen suo yaoqiu de endian.
36|58|“Ping'an!” Zhe shi cong zhi ci zhu fachu de zhuci.
36|59|“Fanzui de renmen ya! Jinri nimen dang tuibi dao yibian qu.
